TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignedCms extends System.Object

summary.span: 类启用 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的签名和验证。

span.span: The class enables signing and verifying of CMS/PKCS #7 messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密消息语法 RFC 为具有这些内容类型的 CMS/PKCS #7 消息指定以下 MIME 类型和文件扩展名。The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types. |内容类型Content type|MIME 类型 (MIME type)MIME type|扩展名Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedDataenvelopedData|application/pkcs7-mimeapplication/pkcs7-mime|。 p7m.p7m| |signedDatasignedData|应用程序/pkcs7-签名application/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c.p7s.p7c|

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数创建 类的实例。

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有以下默认属性值。The class has the following default property values. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (数据) 长度：零1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| ||已分离状态： `false` 签名的内容包括在 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中以及签名信息。Detached state: `false` The content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.| 签名者的默认值 为 SubjectIdentifierType. IssuerAndSerialNumber。The default for signers is SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber. 如果已分离状态 `false` (默认) ，则会将签名的内容包含在 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中以及签名信息。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the signed content is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果已分离状态为 `true` ，如果不能对 S/MIME 消息进行解码，则无法对其进行解码的客户端仍然可以看到该消息的内容。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 这在存档消息内容的存档应用程序中可能非常有用，无论是否可以对消息发送方进行验证。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

exception.span: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

span.span: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.

param.span: 一个 成员，为签名者指定默认主题标识符类型。

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关此构造函数使用的默认属性值，请参阅 。For the default property values used with this constructor, see . 如果已分离状态 `false` (默认) ，则已签名内容将包含在 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中以及签名信息。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果已分离状态为 `true` ，如果不能对 S/MIME 消息进行解码，则无法对其进行解码的客户端仍然可以看到该消息的内容。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 这在存档消息内容的存档应用程序中可能非常有用，无论是否可以对消息发送方进行验证。This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers, the content information as the inner content, and by using the detached state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已分离状态 `false` (默认) ，则已签名内容将包含在 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中以及签名信息。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果已分离状态为 `true` ，如果不能对 S/MIME 消息进行解码，则无法对其进行解码的客户端仍然可以看到该消息的内容。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 这在存档消息内容的存档应用程序中可能非常有用，无论是否可以验证消息发送方的真实性。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether or not the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckHash() cil managed

summary.span: 方法验证 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的数据完整性。

span.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: 是一个专用方法，用于特定的安全基础结构应用程序，这种应用程序只希望检查 CMS 消息的哈希值，而不执行整个数字签名验证。

span.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification.

summary.span: 由于 方法并不涉及对数字签名的验证，因此它不对消息的作者和发送者进行身份验证。

span.span: does not authenticate the author nor sender of the message because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

summary.span: 要对 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的完整性和真实性进行通用检查，请使用 或 方法。

span.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of a CMS/PKCS #7 message, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不提供 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的身份验证。This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

exception.span: 一个方法调用对于对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

summary.span: 验证签名 CMS/PKCS #7 消息上的数字签名。

span.span: Verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: 一个 值，指定是否只验证数字签名而不验证签名者的证书。

span.span: A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则仅验证数字签名。

span.span: If is , only the digital signatures are verified.

param.span: 如果该值为 ，则验证数字签名、签名者的证书和证书的用途。

span.span: If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: 如果证书没有密钥用法或如果密钥用法支持数字签名或认可，则认为该证书的用途有效。

span.span: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法验证签名 CMS/PKCS #7 消息上的数字签名，并验证签名者的证书（可选）。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证 CMS/PKCS #7 消息上的所有签名，包括副署。This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message. 如果消息中包含已签名的属性，则这些属性也会进行验证。If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified. 如果选择了该选项来验证证书，则会验证证书链的整个包含部分。If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated. 如果数字签名验证失败或未满足任何验证要求，此方法将引发异常。This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 验证消息中的签名所需的步骤 。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此示例中，不会分离消息内容。In this example, the message content is not detached. 消息内容包含在 消息中。The message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了 验证消息中的签名所需的步骤 。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此示例中，消息内容已分离，因此消息内容必须独立于消息进行验证 。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 方法通过使用指定的证书集合对签名 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的数字签名进行验证，并对签名者的证书进行验证（可选）。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证 CMS/PKCS #7 消息上的所有签名，包括副署。This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message. 如果消息中包含已签名的属性，则这些属性也会进行验证。If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified. 如果选择了该选项来验证证书，则会验证证书链的整个包含部分。If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated. 如果数字签名验证失败或未满足任何验证要求，此方法将引发异常。This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeSignature() cil managed

summary.span: 创建一个签名，并将该签名添加到 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中。

span.span: Creates a signature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 作为 `signerIdentifierType` 构造函数重载之一的参数提供，则此方法将成功 。This method succeeds if was provided as the `signerIdentifierType` argument of one of the constructor overloads. 否则，它将引发异常。Otherwise, it throws an exception. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 访问签名密钥需要以下权限：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

exception.span: .NET Framework（所有版本）和 .NET Core 3.0 及更高版本：未指定收件人证书。

span.span: .NET Framework (all versions) and .NET Core 3.0 and later: The recipient certificate is not specified.

exception.span: .NET Core 2.2 版本及更早版本：未提供签名者证书。

span.span: .NET Core version 2.2 and earlier: No signer certificate was provided.

param.name: signer
param.span: 一个表示签名者的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the signer.

summary.span: 使用指定的签名者创建一个签名，并将该签名添加到 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中。

span.span: Creates a signature using the specified signer and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 访问签名密钥需要以下权限：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何 使用未分离的消息内容在消息上计算签名。The following example shows the steps to compute a signature on a message with message content that is not detached. 在这种情况下，消息内容包括在 消息中。In this case, the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示了使用分离的消息内容在消息上计算签名的步骤 。The following example shows the steps to compute a signature on a message with message content that is detached. 在这种情况下，消息内容必须独立于消息进行验证 。In this case, the message content must be verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#4)]

exception.span: 未能完成加密操作。

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

Public Sub ComputeSignature (signer As CmsSigner, silent As Boolean)

param.name: signer
param.span: 一个表示签名者的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the signer.

param.name: silent
param.span: 仅 .NET Core：如果在禁用 PIN 提示的情况下请求打开密钥（如果支持），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: .NET Core only: to request opening keys with PIN prompts disabled, where supported; otherwise, .

param.span: 在 .NET Framework 中，不使用此参数，并且将始终显示 PIN 提示（如果需要）。

span.span: In .NET Framework, this parameter is not used and a PIN prompt is always shown, if required.

summary.span: 使用指定的签名者创建一个签名，并将该签名添加到 CMS/PKCS #7 消息中。

span.span: Creates a signature using the specified signer and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅适用于 .NET Core： `silent` 如果值不为 null，则参数不起作用 。.NET Core only: The `silent` parameter has no effect if the value is not null. 提供的值控制是否计算签名显示 PIN 提示。The provided value controls whether or not computing the signature shows a PIN prompt. 即使当 属性为 null 且 `silent` 参数设置为时 `true` ，某些操作系统和签名者选项的组合仍可能导致 PIN 提示。Even when the property is null and the `silent` parameter is set to `true`, some combinations of operating system and signer options can still result in a PIN prompt. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 要显示用户界面，需要具备以下权限：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - 访问签名密钥需要以下权限：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

exception.span: 上声明的默认值为 。

exception.span: 未能完成加密操作。

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

exception.span: 仅限 .NET Framework：未指定签名证书。

span.span: .NET Framework only: A signing certificate is not specified.

exception.span: 仅限 .NET Core：未指定签名证书。

span.span: .NET Core only: A signing certificate is not specified.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentInfo As ContentInfo

summary.span: 属性检索编码 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内部内容。

span.span: The property retrieves the inner contents of the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内容。

span.span: A object that represents the contents of the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Decode(unsigned int8[] encodedMessage) cil managed

param.name: encodedMessage
param.span: 表示待解码的编码 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的字节值数组。

span.span: An array of byte values that represents the encoded CMS/PKCS#7 message to be decoded.

summary.span: 对已编码的 消息进行解码。

span.span: Decodes an encoded message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用从成功解码获得的信息重置对象的所有成员变量。This method resets all member variables of the object by using the information obtained from successful decoding. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 方法在验证消息签名的过程中的位置 。The following example shows the placement of the method in the process of verifying the signatures on a message. 在此示例中，消息内容未分离，因此消息内容包含在 消息中。In this example, the message content is not detached, so the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了 方法在验证消息签名的过程中的位置 。The following example shows the placement of the method in the process of verifying the signatures on a message. 在此示例中，消息内容已分离，因此消息内容必须独立于消息进行验证 。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must be verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

exception.span: 上声明的默认值为 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 未能成功解码。

span.span: could not be decoded successfully.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 属性检索 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的版本。

span.span: The property retrieves the version of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 一个 int 值，表示 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的版本。

span.span: An int value that represents the CMS/PKCS #7 message version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本确定消息是否为 PKCS #7 消息或加密消息语法 (CMS) 消息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的新超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
